abstract: Under new chief executive Carol Bartz, Yahoo’s annual shareholder meeting was a tame affair.
snippet: Under new chief executive Carol Bartz, Yahoo’s annual shareholder meeting was a tame affair.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:11 p.m. Added Ms. Bartz’s comment about discussions with Microsoft.

headline.main: No Storms at This Year’s Yahoo Shareholder Meeting

abstract: Microsoft announced details of pricing for its coming Windows 7 operating system, including free upgrades for customers buying machines that run the current Vista software.
snippet: Microsoft announced details of pricing for its coming Windows 7 operating system, including free upgrades for customers buying machines that run the current Vista software.

headline.main: New Vista Buyers Will Get Free Upgrade to Windows 7
